items.value: A conflict is brewing between [url=%KINGDOM1ID%_ShowKingdomInfo]%KINGDOM1NAME%[/url] and[url=%KINGDOM2ID%_ShowKingdomInfo]%KINGDOM2NAME%[/url]. It started %RANDCAUSE%

[url=%KING1ID%_ShowCitizenInfo]%KING1NAME%[/url], who dislikes [url=%KING2ID%_ShowCitizenInfo]%KING2NAME%[/url], sent [url=%ENVOYID%_ShowCitizenInfo]%ENVOYNAME%[/url] to further escalate the conflict.
The conflict escalated completely, causing damage to the relationship between [url=%KING1ID%_ShowCitizenInfo]%KING1NAME%[/url] and [url=%KING2ID%_ShowCitizenInfo]%KING2NAME%[/url].
